whyMe.projects: I am a dedicated and talented developer with a passion for technology and innovation. I bring creative solutions and a high level of professionalism to every project. My ability to solve complex problems and quickly adapt to new technologies makes me a valuable member of any team.

mySkills.text: I am always open to learning new technologies and improving myself.

myProjects.joinDescription: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System.Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and catepories.
myProjects.elPolloLocoDescription: Jump and run throw based on object-oriented appoach.Help Pepe to find coin and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy han
myProjects.pokedexDescription: The Pokedex is a fictional database containing information about Pokemon. The website offers a search function to find Pokemon and display their attributes.

comment.span: Here's what my colleagues say about me
